extensionDescription.message: Open your daily routine with just one click. Customize each day of the week to launch a different set of pages.

extensionShortName.description: Short name of the extension. Should not exceed 12 characters.

extensionActionTitle.description: Tooltip for the browser action button.

bookmarksSunday.description: Folder name of bookmark exports opened on Sunday.

bookmarksMonday.description: Folder name of bookmark exports opened on Monday.

bookmarksTuesday.description: Folder name of bookmark exports opened on Tuesday.

bookmarksWednesday.description: Folder name of bookmark exports opened on Wednesday.

bookmarksFolderNotFound.description: Error message to show user when no bookmarks folder is found.

bookmarksFolderNotUnique.message: Bookmarks folder name "$NAME$" is not unique.
bookmarksFolderNotUnique.description: Error message to show user when bookmarks folder name is not unique.

bookmarksFolderNotFolder.description: Error message to show user when bookmark is not a folder.

bookmarkPlaceholder.description: Placholder text for the bookmarks import/export input.

bookmarksImportButton.description: Label for the import bookmarks button.

bookmarksExportButton.description: Label for the export bookmarks button.

bookmarksHelpButton.description: Label for the bookmarks help button.

bookmarksImportHelp.message: To import bookmarks, enter a unique folder name. Pages within this folder are assumed to be daily pages. The first seven subfolders in the folder given are assumed to correspond to days of the week, starting with Sunday. Subfolders after the first seven are ignored. Pages within each subfolder will be added to that day's list. Any folders within subfolders are ignored.
bookmarksImportHelp.description: Help message explaining how bookmarks import works.

bookmarksExportHelp.message: To export bookmarks, enter a new folder name. The folder will be added to your bookmarks bar with 7 subfolders, Sunday to Monday. Each subfolder will contain the pages to be opened on that day.
bookmarksExportHelp.description: Help message explaining how bookmarks export works.

closeTabs_active.description: Label for the choice to only close the active tab.

closeTabs_all.description: Label for the choice to close all tabs.

closeTabs_newtab.description: Label for the choice to only close the active tab if it's about:newtab.

closeTabs_preText.description: Text for the option to close windows, before the select box.

closeTabs_postText.description: Text for the option to close windows, after the select box.

closeTabs_unpinned.description: Label for the choice to close only unpinned tabs.

closeTabs_window.description: Label for the choice to close all tabs in the active window.

daysAddButton.description: Label for the Days view add URL button.

daysNewPagePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the Days view add URL input.

daysViewButton.description: Label for the button to choose the Days view.

deleteButton.description: Label for the Days view delete URL button.

editLoader.description: Label for the Days view load URL to edit button.

editPagePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the Days view edit URL input.

editSaver.description: Label for the Days view save edited URL button.

errorIllegalUrl.description: Message to show when `Illegal URL:` error is thrown.

errorInvalidScheme.description: Warning message for invalid URL scheme entries.

errorInvalidUrl.description: Error message for generic invalid URLs.

errorNoPages.message: You do not have any pages configured for today.
errorNoPages.description: Error message for attempting to open routine on a day with no pages set.

errorNoScheme.message: $URL$ does not have a scheme. (Try adding http:// or https:// to the start.)
errorNoScheme.description: Error message for URLs that are missing a scheme.

extantEntry.description: Message to alert user that a page already has an existing entry.

openAsPinned.description: Label for option to open as pinned tabs

pageColumnHeader.description: Column header for the Pages view URL column.

pagesAddButton.description: Label for the Pages view add URL button.

pagesNewPagePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the Pages view URL input.

pagesViewButton.description: Label for the button to choose the Pages view.

popupEditPrefs.description: Text of the popup button to open the extension options page.

popupHeader.description: Header text for the popup shown when pages fail to load.

popupIgnoreWarning.description: Text of the popup button to ignore the warnings in the popup.

randomize.description: Label for the randomize check box.

reloadOpen_preText.description: Text for the option to skip reloading pinned tabs, before the select box.

reloadOpen_postText.description: Text for the option to skip reloading pinned tabs, after the select box.

reloadTabs_all.description: Text for the option to reload all tabs.

reloadTabs_pinned.description: Text for the option to reload only pinned tabs.

reloadTabs_unpinned.description: Text for the option to reload only unpinned tabs.

rowPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for a blank row.

singleBlank.message: Only one row may be blank at a time.
singleBlank.description: Message to alert user that a blank row already exists.

skipOpen.message: Don't open pages already open in
skipOpen.description: Label for the option to skip already open pages.

skipWindow_active.description: Label for the option to skip pages already open in the active window.

skipWindow_all.description: Label for the option to skip pages already open in any window.

viewSelector.description: Instructions for the view selector button.
